scale by mean of group mean for imbalanced data

Source: R/scale_mgm.R
scale_mgm.Rd

scale by mean of group mean for imbalanced data

scale_mgm(expr, label)

Arguments

expr

matrix

label

a vector of group label

Value

scaled matrix

Details

$$z=\frac{x-\frac{\sum_k^{n_D}(\mu_k)}{n_D}}{s_{pooled}}$$ where \(s_{pooled}=\sqrt{\frac{\sum_k^{n_D}{(n_k-1){s_k}^2}}{\sum_k^{n_D}{n_k}-k}}\)

Examples

scale_mgm(matrix(rnorm(100), 10), label = rep(letters[1:2], 5))
#>             [,1]        [,2]        [,3]        [,4]       [,5]        [,6]
#>  [1,]  1.3087901 -0.46870958 -1.77434322 -0.73647719  0.3371481  0.32581901
